mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `t_club_mission` mission, `t_club` club WHERE mission.`mission_id` = #{clubMissionId} AND club.`club_id` = mission.`club_id` AND `TYPE` = 1 AND `IS_DEL` = 0
SELECT * FROM `t_club_mission` club_mission, `t_club` club WHERE club_mission.`club_id` = club.`club_id` AND club_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND club_mission.`type` = 1 AND club.`club_id` = #{clubId}

SELECT * FROM `t_club_mission` club_mission, `t_student_mission_relation` student_mission WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`mission_id` AND club_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND student_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND club_mission.`type` = 1 AND student_mission.`student_id` = #{studentId} AND club_mission.`club_id` = #{clubId}

SELECT * FROM `t_club_mission` club_mission, `t_student_mission_relation` student_mission WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`mission_id` AND club_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND student_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND club_mission.`type` = 1 AND student_mission.`status` = 0 AND student_mission.`student_id` = #{studentId}

SELECT * FROM `t_club_mission` club_mission, `t_school` school, `t_club` club WHERE club_mission.`club_id` = club.`club_id` AND club.`school_id` = school.`school_id` AND club_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND club_mission.`type` = 1 AND school.`school_id` = #{schoolId}

SELECT student.`student_id`, student.`mobile`, student.`nick_name`, student.`real_name`, student.`avatar_url`, student.`status`, student.`is_del` FROM `t_student` student, `t_student_mission_relation` student_mission WHERE student_mission.`student_id` = student.`student_id` AND student_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND student_mission.`mission_id` = #{missionId}

SELECT student.`student_id`, student.`real_name` AS `student_name`, student.`avatar_url`, miss.`mission_id`, miss.`attribution`, miss.`address`, miss.`create_date`, miss.`deadline`, miss.`type`, miss.`club_id`, miss.`parent_id`, relation.`status`, miss.`is_del`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` mission WHERE relation.`mission_id` = mission.`mission_id` AND mission.`parent_id` = miss.`mission_id`) AS child_count FROM `t_student` student, `t_club_mission` miss, `t_student_mission_relation` relation -- WHERE student.`student_id` = relation.`student_id` WHERE miss.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND miss.`parent_id` = #{missionId} AND student.`student_id` = #{studentId} AND relation.`is_del` = 0 GROUP BY miss.`mission_id`

SELECT student.`student_id`, student.`real_name` AS `student_name`, student.`avatar_url`, miss.`mission_id`, miss.`attribution`, miss.`address`, miss.`create_date`, miss.`deadline`, miss.`type`, miss.`club_id`, miss.`parent_id`, relation.`status`, club.`name` AS `club_name`, club.`avatar_url` AS `club_avatar`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` mission WHERE relation.`mission_id` = mission.`mission_id` AND mission.`parent_id` = miss.`mission_id`) AS `child_count`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` mission WHERE relation.`mission_id` = mission.`mission_id` AND mission.`parent_id` = miss.`mission_id` AND relation.`status` = 0) AS `uncofirm_count`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` mission WHERE relation.`mission_id` = mission.`mission_id` AND mission.`parent_id` = miss.`mission_id` AND relation.`status` != 2) AS `unfinish_count` FROM `t_student` student, `t_club_mission` miss, `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club` club WHERE miss.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND miss.`sponsor_id` = #{sponsorId} AND miss.`parent_id` = 0 AND relation.`is_del` = 0 AND miss.`type` = 1 GROUP BY miss.`mission_id`

SELECT relation.`mission_id`, relation.`status`, relation.`comment`, relation.`create_date`, relation.`is_del`, student.`student_id`, student.`mobile`, student.`real_name`, student.`nick_name`, student.`avatar_url`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `t_club_mission` WHERE `parent_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND `sponsor_id` = student.`student_id`) AS `child_mission_count` FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_student` student WHERE relation.`student_id` = student.`student_id` AND relation.`mission_id` = #{missionId} AND relation.`is_del` = 0

SELECT * FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` club_mission WHERE club_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND club_mission.`type` = 1 AND club_mission.`mission_id` = #{missionId} AND club_mission.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND relation.`status` = 0 AND relation.`is_del` = 0

SELECT * FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` club_mission WHERE club_mission.`is_del` = 0 AND club_mission.`type` = 1 AND club_mission.`mission_id` = #{missionId} AND club_mission.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND relation.`status` < 2 AND relation.`is_del` = 0
